name: Description + direction
description: Displays route-related information, showing the path from an origin to a destination along with the estimated travel time. This is ideal for maps, navigation, and tracking the progress of delivery or transit services.
examples: How do I get from point A to point B?
When will my food delivery arrive?
In how many minutes will my friend arrive?

component_title.description: A brief title for the route information card (e.g., 'Route to Work', 'Delivery Status').

hour_time.description: The hour part of the time.

minute_time.description: The minute part of the time.
